trans-unit.source: Allows you to subscribe to incoming events.
trans-unit.target: 可讓您連入事件的訂閱。

trans-unit.source: Each time a desired event is published to an event log, the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.EventRecordWritten"></xref> event is raised, and the method that handles this event will be executed.
trans-unit.target: 所需的事件發行到事件記錄檔，每次<xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.EventRecordWritten"></xref>引發事件，而且處理此事件的方法將會執行。

trans-unit.source: The instances of this class are created from <xref:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogQuery> objects, which specify a query for the event subscription.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個類別的執行個體<xref:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogQuery>物件，指定事件訂閱的查詢。</xref:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogQuery>

trans-unit.source: When an event is logged that matches the criteria expressed in the query, then the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.EventRecordWritten> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 當事件會記錄符合條件表示在查詢中，然後在<xref:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.EventRecordWritten>就會引發事件。</xref:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.EventRecordWritten>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher"></xref> class by specifying an event query.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher"></xref>類別藉由指定 事件查詢。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a query for the event subscription.
trans-unit.target: 指定事件訂閱的查詢。

trans-unit.source: When an event is logged that matches the criteria expressed in the query, then the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.EventRecordWritten"></xref> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 當事件會記錄符合條件表示在查詢中，然後在<xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.EventRecordWritten"></xref>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher"></xref> class by specifying the name or path to an event log.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher"></xref>類別藉由指定的名稱或事件記錄檔的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The path or name of the event log monitor for events.
trans-unit.target: 路徑或名稱的事件記錄檔監視的事件。

trans-unit.source: If any event is logged in this event log, then the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.EventRecordWritten"></xref> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何事件會記錄此事件記錄檔，然後在<xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.EventRecordWritten"></xref>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher"></xref> class by specifying an event query and a bookmark that is used as starting position for the query.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher"></xref>類別藉由指定的事件查詢和書籤做為啟動查詢的位置。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a query for the event subscription.
trans-unit.target: 指定事件訂閱的查詢。

trans-unit.source: When an event is logged that matches the criteria expressed in the query, then the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.EventRecordWritten"></xref> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 當事件會記錄符合條件表示在查詢中，然後在<xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.EventRecordWritten"></xref>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The bookmark (placeholder) used as a starting position in the event log or stream of events.
trans-unit.target: 書籤 （預留位置） 做為事件記錄檔或事件資料流中的開始位置。

trans-unit.source: Only events that have been logged after the bookmark event will be returned by the query.
trans-unit.target: 只有事件之後會查詢所傳回的書籤事件已記錄。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher"></xref> class by specifying an event query, a bookmark that is used as starting position for the query, and a Boolean value that determines whether to read the events that already exist in the event log.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher"></xref>藉由指定 事件查詢、 會做為啟動查詢中，位置的書籤和布林值，決定是否要讀取事件記錄檔中已存在的事件類別。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a query for the event subscription.
trans-unit.target: 指定事件訂閱的查詢。

trans-unit.source: When an event is logged that matches the criteria expressed in the query, then the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.EventRecordWritten"></xref> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 當事件會記錄符合條件表示在查詢中，然後在<xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.EventRecordWritten"></xref>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The bookmark (placeholder) used as a starting position in the event log or stream of events.
trans-unit.target: 書籤 （預留位置） 做為事件記錄檔或事件資料流中的開始位置。

trans-unit.source: Only events that have been logged after the bookmark event will be returned by the query.
trans-unit.target: 只有事件之後會查詢所傳回的書籤事件已記錄。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that determines whether to read the events that already exist in the event log.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，決定是否要讀取之事件的事件記錄檔中已存在。

trans-unit.source: If this value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, then the existing events are read and if this value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, then the existing events are not read.
trans-unit.target: 如果此值為<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>，然後讀取現有事件的而且如果此值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>，則不會讀取現有的事件。

trans-unit.source: Releases all the resources used by this object.
trans-unit.target: 釋放這個物件所使用的所有資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by this object, and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放這個物件時，所使用的 unmanaged 的資源並選擇性釋放 managed 的資源。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this object starts delivering events to the event delegate.
trans-unit.target: 判斷此物件是否開始將事件傳遞給事件委派。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when this object can deliver events to the event delegate, and returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> when this object has stopped delivery.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>時這個物件可以傳遞事件到事件的委派，以及傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>當此物件已停止傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Allows setting a delegate (event handler method) that gets called every time an event is published that matches the criteria specified in the event query for this object.
trans-unit.target: 可讓設定委派 （事件處理常式方法），每次在發行的事件取得呼叫符合條件的事件中指定此物件的查詢。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
